arguments.template:
{{textFor('select')}}
{{textFor('dropFilesHere')}}
! {{ file.name }} {{ getFileValidationMessage(file) }} {{ getFileExtension(file) }} {{ file.name }} {{ getTotalFilesSizeMessage([file]) }}
{{progress}}%
! {{file.name}} Total: {{ files.length }} files, {{ getTotalFilesSizeMessage(files) }} {{ getInvalidFilesMessage() }}

<button #clearButton type="button" class="k-button k-clear-selected"
            [attr.tabIndex]="-1"
            (click)="clearFiles($event)">
                {{textFor('clearSelectedFiles')}}
        </button>
        <button #uploadButton type="button" class="k-button k-primary k-upload-selected"
            [attr.tabIndex]="-1"
            (click)="performUpload($event)">
                {{textFor('uploadSelectedFiles')}}
        </button>
